mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart (courseIdx, memberId, regDate) VALUES (#{courseIdx}, #{memberId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.idx, c.courseIdx, c.memberId, c.regDate, co.title, co.price, co.teacherId, co.thumbnail FROM tbl_cart c JOIN tbl_course co ON c.courseIdx = co.idx WHERE c.memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY c.regDate DESC
